N_bursts_cycle_chd.description: Number of bursts in a tracking cycle

N_ku_pulses_rc_chd.description: Number of Ku-band pulses in a radar cycle

N_c_pulses_rc_chd.description: Number of C-band pulses in a radar cycle

N_ku_pulses_burst_chd.description: Number of Ku-band pulses per burst

N_c_pulses_burst_chd.description: Number of C-band pulses per burst

N_cal_pulses_burst_chd.description: Number of Calibration pulses per burst

N_samples_lrm_chd.description: Number of samples per each LRM pulse

N_samples_sar_chd.description: Number of samples per each SAR pulse

tx1_lrm_chd.description: Time characterised on ground to shift the telemetered time to the previous transmitted pulse in LRM mode

tx1_sar_chd.description: Time characterised on ground to shift the telemetered time to the previous transmitted pulse in SAR mode

fai_shift_number_chd.description: Number of fai shifts to complete one sample in LRM and SAR science waveforms

x_ant_chd.description: Antenna X component in the satellite reference frame

y_ant_chd.description: Antenna Y component in the satellite reference frame

z_ant_chd.description: Antenna Z component in the satellite reference frame

x_cog_chd.description: Center of Gravity X component in the satellite reference frame

y_cog_chd.description: Center of Gravity Y component in the satellite reference frame

z_cog_chd.description: Center of Gravity Z component in the satellite reference frame

antenna_beamwidth_ku_chd.description: Antenna beamwidth at 3 dB for Ku-band

antenna_beamwidth_c_chd.description: Antenna beamwidth at 3 dB for C-band

attcode_ground_cal1_lrm_ku_chd.description: Calibration ATT code for CAL1 LRM Ku measured on ground

attcode_ground_cal1_lrm_c_chd.description: Calibration ATT code for CAL1 C Ku measured on ground

attcode_ground_cal1_sar_ku_chd.description: Calibration ATT code for CAL1 SAR Ku measured on ground

attcode_ground_cal1_sar_c_chd.description: Calibration ATT code for CAL1 SAR C measured on ground

fine_shift_number_chd.description: Number of fine shifts to complete one sample in CAL1 LRM waveforms

total_power_ref_ground_cal1_lrm_ku_chd.description: Total power of the PTR (CAL1 LRM Ku) waveform measured on ground

total_power_ref_ground_cal1_lrm_c_chd.description: Total power of the PTR (CAL1 LRM C) waveform measured on ground

total_power_ref_ground_cal1_sar_ku_chd.description: Total power of the PTR (CAL1 SAR Ku) waveform measured on ground

total_power_ref_ground_cal1_sar_c_chd.description: Total power of the PTR (CAL1 SAR C) waveform measured on ground

max_power_ref_ground_cal1_lrm_ku_chd.description: Maximum power of the PTR (CAL1 LRM Ku) waveform measured on ground

max_power_ref_ground_cal1_lrm_c_chd.description: Maximum power of the PTR (CAL1 LRM C) waveform measured on ground

max_power_ref_ground_cal1_sar_ku_chd.description: Maximum power of the PTR (CAL1 SAR Ku) waveform measured on ground

max_power_ref_ground_cal1_sar_c_chd.description: Maximum power of the PTR (CAL1 SAR C) waveform measured on ground

ext_delay_ground_ku_chd.description: External delay between the duplexor and the antenna measured on ground (Ku-band)

ext_delay_ground_c_chd.description: External delay between the duplexor and the antenna measured on ground (C-band)

int_delay_ground_cal1_lrm_ku_chd.description: Internal delay of the PTR (CAL1 LRM Ku) waveform measured on ground

int_delay_ground_cal1_lrm_c_chd.description: Internal delay of the PTR (CAL1 LRM C) waveform measured on ground

int_delay_ground_cal1_sar_ku_chd.description: Internal delay of the PTR (CAL1 SAR Ku) waveform measured on ground

int_delay_ground_cal1_sar_c_chd.description: Internal delay of the PTR (CAL1 SAR C) waveform measured on ground

rfu_rx_gain_ground_chd.description: Combination of RFU gains in the receiving chain

onboard_proc_lrm_ku_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the LRM Ku-band digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, alpha)

onboard_proc_lrm_c_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the LRM C-band digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, alpha)

onboard_proc_sar_raw_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the SAR Raw digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta)

onboard_proc_sar_rmc_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the SAR RMC digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, delta)

onboard_proc_lrm_ku_cal1_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the CAL1 LRM Ku-band digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, alpha)

onboard_proc_lrm_c_cal1_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the CAL1 LRM C-band digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, alpha)

onboard_proc_sar_ku_cal1_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the CAL1 SAR Ku digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta)

onboard_proc_sar_c_cal1_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the CAL1 SAR C digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta)

onboard_proc_pulse_cal1_chd.description: Combination of on-board fixed digital gains for the CAL1 Pulse digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta)

onboard_proc_lrm_ku_cal1_ref_chd.description: Combination of fixed digital gains for the CAL1 LRM Ku-band digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, alpha) measured on-ground

onboard_proc_lrm_c_cal1_ref_chd.description: Combination of fixed digital gains for the CAL1 LRM C-band digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, alpha) measured on-ground

onboard_proc_sar_ku_cal1_ref_chd.description: Combination of fixed digital gains for the CAL1 SAR Ku digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta) measured on-ground

onboard_proc_sar_c_cal1_ref_chd.description: Combination of fixed digital gains for the CAL1 SAR C digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta) measured on-ground

onboard_proc_pulse_cal1_ref_chd.description: Combination of fixed digital gains for the CAL1 Pulse digital chain from ADC converter to TM (it includes ADC, FFTs, beta) measured on-ground

var_dig_gain_lrm_ku_cal1_ref_chd.description: Variable digital gain for the CAL1 LRM Ku digital chain measured on-ground

var_dig_gain_lrm_c_cal1_ref_chd.description: Variable digital gain for the CAL1 LRM C digital chain measured on-ground

var_dig_gain_sar_ku_cal1_ref_chd.description: Variable digital gain for the CAL1 SAR Ku digital chain measured on-ground

var_dig_gain_sar_c_cal1_ref_chd.description: Variable digital gain for the CAL1 SAR C digital chain measured on-ground

var_dig_gain_pulse_cal1_ref_chd.description: Variable digital gain for the CAL1 Pulse digital chain measured on-ground

ins_losses_ground_chd.description: Combination of instrument power losses in the receiving chain (waveguides, etc.)

power_tx_ant_ku_chd.description: Antenna SSPA RF Peak Transmitted Power in Ku band

power_tx_ant_c_chd.description: SSPA RF Peak Transmitted Power in C band

alt_freq_multiplier_chd.description: Factor to convert from USO frequency to altimeter frequency

pri_T0_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts PRI to T0 units

cai_cor2_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts CAI to COR2 units

h0_cor2_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts HO to COR2 units

T0_h0_unit_conv_chd.description: Factor that converts T0 to H0 units

i_sample_start_chd.description: The RMC ASIC truncates the time domain burst and keeps only the range gates with indexes going from (i_sample_start_chd) to (i_sample_start_chd + N_samples_sar_chd/2-1)
